data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3627393,"name":"Falon Clark","username":"Tatiman-Dev","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tatiman-dev/{size}/236095_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-17T20:33:10.518Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHello! One of the constant battles my team fights is keeping our closet clean, and keeping its contents tracked. I’m curious if any teams have found solutions for themselves for either of these problems. People often don’t know where to put things, and rather than asking, they just put it in the first free spot. We also have been unsuccessful at keeping track of what consumables we have, as any time we’ve tried to do inventory, people continue to move stuff without informing our inventory people.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-05-17T20:33:10.518Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":210,"readers_count":209,"score":77.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":501950,"topic_slug":"inventory-management-in-frc","display_username":"Falon Clark","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57393,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"The Kotlin Guy"},"post_url":"/t/inventory-management-in-frc/501950/1","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3627402,"name":"Prince","username":"Prince","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/ba9def/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-17T20:37:32.492Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe have a super pit (road cases) so we decided to move almost all of our inventory items into it. And we placed the inventory software called ‘inventoria’ on the corner pit of the super pit. We tell students that if they want to get anything their first spot to check is the inventory system. If they don’t know how to use the inventory system they can ask someone.
